metadata.description: Classic' tales of the Sentry at the birth of the Marvel Age! Discover the previously unexplored history of the Golden Guardian of Good as he battles the Mad Thinker; Ursus the Ultra Bear; Mountain Man; and Cranio, the Man with the Tri-Level Mind - all leading up to a final showdown with his arch nemesis, the Void!
metadata.name: The Age Of The Sentry
